thread.title: Here are the big reveals from the 2018 Detroit Auto Show

title: Here are the big reveals from the 2018 Detroit Auto Show
text:
Here are the big reveals from the 2018 Detroit Auto Show SHARES 
Automakers unveiled several new car and truck models at the North American International Auto Show in Detroit . New trucks, crossovers, and concept cars were among the latest crop of vehicles, as well as a few old favorites. The 2019 Mercedes-Benz G-Class 
Mercedes-Benz's V8 engine churns out 416 horsepower and has several settings for luxury off-roading. The Lexus LF-1 Limitless concept Lexus 
It's the carmaker's newest luxury crossover concept. By 2025, Lexus says all of its models will have electrified versions. Ram 1500 Ram 2019 Ram 1500 Rebel 
Fiat Chrysler just introduced the next generation of its classic pickup truck, which it says is lighter, quieter, and more fuel-efficient. The all-new Volkswagen Jetta
